section.p: This section is about me, Benoit Nadeau. While it always feels strange to talk about oneself, and worse, someone else's narcissistic rant, I'll try my best to make these pages as entertaining as possible.

subsection.title: Benad?
subsection.p: What is the origin of the strange nickname "Benad"?

subsection.title: What I'm not
subsection.p: What you assume I am, but if you start to know me, am not.

subsection.title: Autobiography
subsection.p: A short autobiography of some kind.
